author: Julie R. Thomson
title: The Best St. Patrick's Day Crock Pot Recipes

organizations.name: crockpot corned beef and cabbage soup pip & ebby

text:
The Best St. Patrick's Day Crock Pot Recipes All the joys of Irish food, with all the ease of a Crock Pot. By Julie R. Thomson 
Saint Patrick’s Day is one of our favorite food holidays . Sure, it doesn’t generate the same excitement as Thanksgiving , but it gives us the excuse to make some of our favorite wintertime dishes right at the moment when it feels like the cold weather will never end. It’s the break we all desperately need. 
Saint Patrick’s Day gives us the excuse to braise our meats in stout, to make big pots of beef stew , and to serve it all with the best mashed potatoes . Plus, don’t forget about the Irish soda bread and Guinness desserts . This year, St. Paddy’s Day feels even more exciting because we have a handful of slow cooker recipes that’ll help us celebrate this cold-weather holiday with ease. 1 Slow Cooker Corned Beef And Cabbage Foodie Crush 2 Slow Cooker Guinness Beef Stew The Cookie Rookie Get the Slow Cooker Guinness Beef Stew recipe from The Cookie Rookie 3 Slow Cooker Shepherd's Pie A Spicy Perspective Get the Slow Cooker Shepherd's Pie recipe from A Spicy Perspective 4 Slow Cooker Corned Beef And Cabbage Sliders The Cookie Rookie 5 Slow Cooker Creamy Garlic Mashed Potatoes Cooking Classy 6 Slow Cooker Bailey's Irish Cream Hot Chocolate The Magical Slow Cooker Get the Slow Cooker Bailey's Irish Cream Hot Chocolate recipe from The Magical Slow Cooker 7 Crockpot Corned Beef And Cabbage Soup Pip & Ebby
